text: هذه النار التى كنتم بها تكذبون

translations.translation: 'This is the Fire which you denied!
(And told:) "This is the fire which you denied.
“This is the Hell which you used to give the lie to.”
and they will be told, "This is the fire which you called a lie.
“This is the fire, which you used to deny!”
This is the Fire which you used to deny.
This is the fire which you used to give the lie to.
This is the fire that you cried lies to!
(And it is said unto them): This is the Fire which ye were wont to deny.
This is the fire which you used to deny.
This is the Fire which ye were wont to believe.
‘This is the Fire which you used to deny!
This:, it will be said, "Is the Fire,- which ye were wont to deny!
This is the Fire which you used to belie.
(it will be said to them): 'This is the Fire which you belied!
“This is the Fire which you used to deny.
This is the Fire which you used to deny.
[52:14] ‘This is the Fire which you used to deny!

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: هَذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ (14(، والمقصود بالإِشارة التوطئة لمَا سيرد بعدها من قوله : { التي كنتم بها تكذبون } إلى { لا تبصرون } .والموصول وصلته في قوله : { التي كنتم بها تكذبون } لتنبيه المخاطبين على فساد رأيهم إذ كذبوا بالحشر والعقاب فرأوا ذلك عياناً .

translations.translation: The angels in-charge of hell will say to them: (This is the Fire which ye were wont to deny) in the life of the world. 616
